Articles.Content: I am very happy to be aboard and am looking forward to learning all I can about the Kerbal Space program. Thanks for the new ability!

Hello spacemans and welcome to the KSP Forums!

This is a great place to learn about how to play the game among other enthusiasts.


Happy landings!
Never be afraid to ask a question. I have found myself stymied at times, but the community has always been there to help me out.
The KSP discussion subforum is a place where you can learn and talk about KSP.
